changelog.change: [Fix] Deleting personal albums does not decrease user_images (Bug #645)
[Fix] Do not allow image_rotate and exif_data Option when the functions are missing.
[Feature] Inform admin fpr new updates on gallery/index
[Fix] imagerotate() only available in "bundled version of the GD library" (Bug #642)
[Fix] "Force to delete Outdated files" does not work with other PHP filename extensions and GALLERY_ROOT_PATH (Bug #643)
[Fix] Do not view comment-stats if comments are disabled
[Fix] Increase performance for calls to gallery_acl_check (Contributions to Derky)
[Fix] ACP Option for JPG-Quality when rotating and resizing images. (Bug #634)
[Fix] phpbb-Bug::#46315: "Fix dynamic config update routine error if firebird is used"
[Fix] Do not loose exif-data while rotating an image (Bug #633)
[Change] One file for the image-block for easier styling
[Feature] Copy permissions from one to other albums

action-group.diy-instructions:
Rufe install/ auf und führe das Update-Script aus
Leere den Cache im "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Allgemein" > "Den Cache leeren"
Aktualisiere deine Styles: "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Templates" > jedes > "Aktualisieren" "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Themes" > jedes > "Aktualisieren" "Administrations-Bereich" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Grafiksammlungen" > jedes > "Aktualisieren"

Browse to install/ and run the update-script
Clear your cache in the "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "General" > "Purge the cache"
Refresh your Styles: "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Templates" > each > "refresh" "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Themes" > each > "refresh" "Administration Control Panel" (ACP) > "Styles" > "Imagesets" > each > "refresh"
